conclusion: Objects A and B move through the air and are placed down at the location of objects A, B, C, and D.
Objects come into contact with other objects due to gravity.
Objects A and B are positioned above the table.
Objects C and D are on the table.
Objects A and B will fall onto the table and come to rest on top of objects C and D.
Objects E and F are on the couch.
Objects E and F will remain on the couch and will not be affected by the movement of objects A and B.
